title: The purpose of going to New York

content.description:
Uncontextualized Dialogue

Selection plays one time.
content.question: Why is the woman going to New York?

choices.label: She was invited for a job interview.
She has to replace an employee who quit.
She has a meeting with a client.

content.answer: She has to replace an employee who quit.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
